At Renovations By Matt we are committed to excellent service and quality workmanship. Whether your looking for a TO-DO LIST you cant seem to finish, Plumbing issues and installations by our licensed staff or a Full Reno Project, We are here to Help 

From designing to finished products, our expert staff will make your renovation ideas come to life. 

We use top quality trades and materials to ensure the repair or project is done right. 
 
 
Email or Call us for more Details.
 
We Offer Plumbing and Waterproofing Services.  
 
Services include: Plumbing repairs and new installations, drain services, waterproofing and More!!
products: PLUMBING FIXTURES, BATHROOM FIXTURES, DRYWALL PAINT TRIM WORK AND MORE!
services:
Drywalling, painting, framing, tiling, Decks, Baths, Kitchens & More. 
We are now offering Plumbing Waterproofing, drain services and repairs/replacements, affordable pricing and quality guaranteed workmanship.
We Will Provide Quality Workmanship @ Great Prices

profile:
TY Co is a company dedicated to fulfill our client's needs and give them the best experience through their home improvements, additions and new construction.  We've had over 9 years of experience in the business and have done the countless amount of projects having a great customer service and experience during the job 

why should you hire us over anybody else ?

1. We have our team: TY co has a specialized team for any type of renovation, we have the best trades on our list and make sure we have the best execution system to get everything done properly.
2. We finish everything on time and on budget: our team will make sure project will be done on time and on budget, many contractors tend to make promises but we actually get it done efficiently, if we don't we will pay back a penalty towards your final price to make up for the delay (conditions apply)
3.The project will cost you less if you do it with us: why? because we finish the job on time and on budget, we give fixed price with no extra costs. Our company is regularly called upon by homeowners to come in and fix all their problems. 
4.The job will get finished : we finish 100% of the jobs we start
5.Other people say so: we are willing to give you referral numbers of all of the previous clients that  have had jobs done by us related to the one we are providing you 
6.We guarantee our results

-Feel free to check out our portfolio in the gallery to see our most recent projects

profile: AVL Landscape and design is a family orientated company with over 15 years of experience within the industry. Our number one priority is pleasing our clients and fulfilling their expectations. Our vast knowledge of top-rated products and design allows our staff to cater uniquely to each project. We specialize in custom landscaping, offering personalized cedar decks, interlocking, concrete, water features (such as ponds, waterfalls), outdoor lighting effects, fireplaces and outdoor kitchens. We take great pride in our work and maintain a high standard of excellence in everything we do. We look forward to working on your next outdoor project and promise nothing less than the best.
name: Avl Landscape & Design
